definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: This is not the shape of semicircle of nutritious health problems?
sentences.chinese: 沒有這半圓的形狀的人的健康有營養問題嗎？

sentences.english: Depending on the size of the half- circles the straight connection varies in length.
sentences.chinese: 隨半圓的大小不同，連接的直線長度也不同。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, the stone was found close by the apse of the church.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，石頭是在聖堂靠近半圓壁龕處被發現的。

sentences.english: Round head low square neck carriage bolts.
The wobble is shown in the half-circles.
sentences.chinese: 抖動以圖中的半圓來顯示。

sentences.english: It is usually a semicircular wheaten food with stuffing.
sentences.chinese: 它通常是有餡的半圓形的麥制食品。

sentences.english: The Japan Pavilion is a semi-circular structure, covered by a purple membrane material.
sentences.chinese: 日本館呈半圓形，採用紫色薄膜材料包裹。

sentences.english: Semi-circular concrete members are a new type of structural members used for harbour engineering.
sentences.chinese: 半圓形構件是港口工程中新型構件。

sentences.english: But when they were approaching the cross in the street, they stopped suddenly and gathered into a semi-circle.
sentences.chinese: 將到丁字街口，便突然立住，簇成一個半圓。

sentences.english: Monolith, The Face of Half Dome, Yosemite National Park, 1927
sentences.chinese: 巨石，半圓山的容姿，約塞米蒂國家公園1927。

sentences.english: You type the different characters by sliding the domes to create letters and numbers.
sentences.chinese: 你靠移動半圓來輸入不同的字符以打出字母和數字。

sentences.english: Ear is a semicircle, nose is black, short tail, very lovely.
sentences.chinese: 耳朵是半圓形，鼻子是黑色，尾巴短短的，很可愛。

sentences.english: An "orange flag", a half-moon orange slice and a speared cherry, is the standard garnish on a whisky sour.
sentences.chinese: 這種雞尾酒的裝飾是使用半圓型的橙子片和櫻桃。

sentences.english: In experiments, the researchers placed 16 cameras in a half-circle.
sentences.chinese: 在實驗中，研究人員用16個攝像機組成一個半圓。

sentences.english: Trigonal tongue cover, generous sculpt, easy to open.
sentences.chinese: 半圓形舌蓋，造型大方，方便開啓。
